reviews.title: Please guide me
reviews.comment: I know that this app is very good! But please guide me, how to use this app? I started to use it, but I don\'t know where can I see the subtitles. :\'( I will not uninstalled this \'cause I know that this app will be great if I already know how to use it. Please reply quickly. Thanks! :) And I promise that I will rate this app 5 stars if you guide me. :)
reviews.author: Kristine De Jesus

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: 6 book limit. Extreamly basic both graphically and feature-wise. Better aps available but if all you want to do is to listen to an audiobook I suppose theyre all the same. Some people may actually prefer the chunkier buttons on this app, particularly for those with smaller screens. Also, contrary to other reviews, all my m4b files worked on this app.
reviews.author: Mark Trappett

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Good player. Would be great to have 2 rewinds for short and long pauses
reviews.author: Gennadiy Sterin

reviews.title: The most inconsistant app
reviews.comment: Ok. I really dig the concept of this app and I like many aspects about it. But it was poorly executed. I get having random tracts play, restarting itself, and when i turn off the phone, refusing to play in the background, or worse refuse to turn itself off when another app wanted to use sound (such as a phone-call), etc. I could go on an on.  I get the concept and its a very good app. It feels like it was designed by a 14 year old learning to program and its a good app in that it can be so much better, but i implore people to avoid it.
reviews.author: Joseph Grigoletti

reviews.title: easy to use
reviews.comment: I like how easy it is to use and actually holds my spot.Don\'t know is im doing something wrong but I can\'t put more than 6 books on it It won\'t let me add anymore than that. if there is a solution to this please let me know
reviews.author: Margaret Johnson

reviews.title: Jolly good
reviews.comment: Like the ability to select particular folders (so can exclude audio books from music player by hiding the file), the various settings give good flexibility.  Would like bigger buttons and, not a biggie, to be able to add more book \"folders\" to the home screen.  Otherwise, jolly good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DO NOT Waste your time!!
reviews.comment: This app does not have hardly any options and it doesn\'t support chapters at all, so you\'d better remember your position cause it restarts at the beginning OFTEN!!!
reviews.author: Robert Turpin

reviews.title: Great App! Here is a trick!
reviews.comment: When transferring your audiobook\'s files onto your device,  do not put them into your Audio folder.  This will keep them out of your play music app. Works great on my Nexus 7 tablet.
reviews.author: Jack Bishop

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The app is great and easy to use. I wish it would look less simple though.
reviews.author: Leo M

reviews.title: DOES support .m4b
reviews.comment: Not sure why other people are saying it doesn\'t. Maybe their files are corrupted? I\'m listening to an .m4b file right now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Can\'t find a way to fast forward and makes it difficult with long files, longer than an hour.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far so good!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been searching for an audio book reader for a while. I like that this one saves my place in multiple books. There are some bugs, but none worth listing that I\'ve found so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great!
reviews.comment: i was looking for a player for my audioboks and this is great. thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t support my m4b files
reviews.comment: Most of my audio books are in M4B format and a few are MP3 or other formats.  Only the MP3 and other files show up in my library and all my M4B files are hidden or not supported.  I would assume a corrupt file, but not on ALL my M4B files only.  Maybe it is the size of the file it doesn\'t support.  But, those exact same M4B audiobook files work on most other audiobook players for my same device.    Also, I really like having an easy fast forward/reverse button with easy increments like 10 seconds and 1 minute.  This player doesn\'t offer that. Just next or previous file/book or stop.
reviews.author: Ed Fritz

reviews.title: can\'t figure out how to bookmark
reviews.comment: I don\'t have a camera button on Samsung Galaxy, can\'t seem to find another way to bookmark audiobook :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very very good!!
reviews.comment: Simple, user frendly...all you need. I recomand it
reviews.author: Josip Mobi
